com.bindroid.trackable
Class Trackable

java.lang.Object
  com.bindroid.trackable.Trackable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TrackableBoolean, TrackableByte, TrackableChar, TrackableCollection, TrackableDouble, TrackableField, TrackableFloat, TrackableInt, TrackableLong, TrackableShort
public class Trackable
extends java.lang.Object

Provides an object to which Tracker can subscribe for notifications as well as methods that allow a Tracker to evaluate an Action or Function while subscribing to notifications for any trackers used during that evaluation. Most uses of raw Trackables will be TrackableFields and TrackableCollections. Raw Trackables are primarily useful when manually wrapping the behavior of an object that uses the Listener pattern for its notifications, calling track() in the getter for the property and updateTrackers() when the Listener notifies of a change to its value. Trackable instances are meant to be as lightweight as possible in order to minimize their overhead when used in large numbers of objects.

Constructor Detail

Trackable

public Trackable()
Constructs a new Trackable.

Method Detail

track

public static void track(Tracker tracker,
                         Action<java.lang.Void> action)
Causes a Tracker to track any Trackables on which track() was called while executing the given Action. Tracker.update() will be called at most once for all Trackables tracked while executing the action.

Parameters:
tracker - The tracker to subscribe.
action - The action to run.

track

public static <T> T track(Tracker tracker,
                          Function<T> function)
Causes a Tracker to track any Trackables on which track() was called while evaluating the given Function. The result of the function is returned. Tracker.update() will be called at most once for all Trackables tracked while evaluating the function.

Parameters:
tracker - The tracker to subscribe.
function - The function to evaluate.
Returns:
The result of the function.

track

public void track()
Captures any Trackers that are configured to track(Tracker, Action) this evaluation. These trackers will be notified the next time updateTrackers() is called.

updateTrackers

public void updateTrackers()
Notifies any Trackers watching this Trackable.
